author: Lon.TV
description:
Find a Switch 2 at Walmart - https://lon.tv/r74va (compensated affiliate link) -    Nintendo's Switch 2 launched last week and I managed to pick one up at retail without having a preorder. While this was the most boring console launch I can remember it's proven to be the most successful one for Nintendo with over 3 million sold. Here's my first impressions
